attributes.action: Refuse Bail To ALL Violent Offenders and Reoffenders Automatically.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When someone commits a violent offence they should not be granted bail under any circumstances. Bail should only be granted to offenders who are deemed non-violent and low-risk. Violent offences or offences against children or elderly people should immediately warrant remand.
